# Elixir Programming Principles
> Core principles for writing maintainable and idiomatic Elixir code, focusing on readability and immutability.

## Resources
* [Writing Readable Elixir Code](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/writing-readable-elixir-code.html): Official guide on code clarity.
* [Basic Types - Immutability (Getting Started)](https://elixir-lang.org/getting-started/basic-types.html#immutability): Explanation of immutability in Elixir.
* [Anti-Patterns: Boolean obsession](https://hexdocs.pm/elixir/main/anti-patterns.html#boolean-obsession): Discussion on avoiding the overuse of booleans.
